text:
Although this has nothing to do with releasing v1.6, but could someone please review this?
<https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/39710|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/39710>

elements.text: Although this has nothing to do with releasing v1.6, but could someone please review this?

text: This is not my thing, but I’ve been wondering why there are so many open pull requests. If one were to close those that haven’t been updated in one year, this would remove 370 or so (and 1900 issues or so).
